We are one of the ancient Olympian Gods, sent to Earth to learn a lesson in beerity!
 Now, we must fight alongside humanity to stand a chance of regaining our love of beer.
By drinking this beer you will have the power to control and manipulate fire, and can even create your own balls.
Now, you protect Åsbygda from crazy people, while also battling the evil plans of Daniel “Soul Stealer” Malone!
